name: mcfunction
description: An extension to add support for Minecraft functions using a language server
author: Levertion

mcfunction.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

mcfunction.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the language server.

mcfunction.commandsFilePath.description: The path to the set of commands to use. The file must have commands on each line as in https://gist.github.com/Dinnerbone/943fbcd763c19be188ed6b72a12d7e65/a7ecc4cfb1d12b66aeb6d4e7f643bec227f0d4f7. This path is first checked relative to the workspace root, then as an absolute path. If this is not a file, extension falls back to version as defined in the extension
